thread.section_title: The Nadler Victoria - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant Stay
thread.title_full: Pleasant Stay - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Allison D
title: Pleasant Stay
text: Stayed here for just one night, but wish it could have been longer. The room was very comfortable & well appointed, particularly for the price and location. There is some construction across the street, but it wasn't at all bothersome (at least on a weekend). Quick walk to both Buckingham Palace and the Victoria tube station, making for very easy movement around the city. I'll be back.
